data.message: Facebook, can you please confirm if the  site will begin charging as of 6pm today? I keep gettong forwarded messages from friends that are allegedly from Mark Zuckenburg that direct users to forward the message to a certain number of contacts or they wont have access? I would think something affectong so many would make the news or users would receive an email or something? Please advise at your earliest convenience. Thanks😁

replies.message: Hey there. Thanks for checking in with us. This campaign is a known hoax. If you see content like this on Facebook, please report it to us as spam by using these tips from our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2hY9Zpn. -Kiara
So facebook just picks someone to support huh? What about my issue? And many others who have issues?
